introduction: Contains most of Kate's videos up to 1986: All songs from the corresponding album plus the video for The Big Sky. The video to Experime nt IV is only available here, so TSF + HOTH isn't sufficient. A new PAL LaserDisc now also contains the three videos from The Sensual World. A 2 videoCD (CD-ROMs with MPEG films for computers/ CD-I players) now available contains in addition to the new LaserDisc version also Rubberband Girl and Moments Of PleasureTracks: see albums above.01 Wuthering Heights (New Vocal)02 Cloudbusting03 Man With the Child in His Eyes04 Breathing05 Wow06 Hounds of Love07 Running up That Hill08 Army Dreamers09 Sat in Your Lap10 Experiment IV11 The Dreaming12 Babooshka13 The Big Sky
